title: [Large-scale] Strategic Role of Higher Education Instructional Design: Case-Based Practical Analysis

context.additional_context: Language curriculum for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, exploring effective instructional design under budget constraints and BYOD environments. Operated primarily through case analysis using simulations/VR

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more core functions performed by instructional designers in higher education environments.
Learners can compare and evaluate differences in instructional design between on-site and remote education through case study analysis.
Learners can propose instructional design strategies applicable to language curricula using VR simulation tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
